quizDescription: Test your knowledge of famous inventions and their inventors with this general knowledge quiz.

questions.question: Who is credited with inventing the telephone?
questions.explanation: Alexander Graham Bell is known for inventing the telephone.

questions.question: What invention is Thomas Edison most famous for?
questions.explanation: Thomas Edison is renowned for inventing the practical electric light bulb.

questions.question: Who developed the World Wide Web (WWW) in 1989?
questions.explanation: Tim Berners-Lee is credited with developing the World Wide Web (WWW) in 1989.

questions.question: Which inventor is associated with the development of the first practical airplane?
questions.explanation: The Wright Brothers, Orville and Wilbur Wright, are known for developing the first practical airplane.

questions.question: Who invented the computer programming language known as COBOL?
questions.explanation: Grace Hopper is credited with the development of the COBOL programming language.
